text: The Mayor of Coimbatore is the first citizen of the city of Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India. ==List of mayors== # V. Gopalakrishnan 1996-2001 # T. Malaravan 2001-2006 # R. Venkatachalam 2006-2011 # S. M. Velusamy 2011-2014 # Ganapathi P. Raj Kumar 2014-present ==Reference== Category:Tamil Nadu politicians Coi Coimbatore mayor Category:Coimbatore
title: Mayor of Coimbatore
